item.title: A very intro introduction to DPLYR, from RLadies MTL
item.description: Last month, on a break during my workday, I decided to google some communities where I could practice and learn to code in R. It had been on my mind for a while, as Iâ€™ve had many side project ideas and occasionally get stuck from small errors ! ~R Ladies~ I came across R Ladies - a community of women (and other folks) in Montreal that meet once a month to learn something new in R!
